title: IConfiguration.GetExpanded
description: Gets whether this configuration's node is expanded in the specified pane of the ConfigurationManager.

parameters.name: WhichPane
parameters.description: Valid options in swFeatMgrPane_e : swFeatMgrPaneTop swFeatMgrPaneBottom

returns: True if node is expanded, false if not
